ComicInfo.Summary: After saving the world with a host of other heroes, Grifter decides to stick around in Nicaragua. He is attacked by Neo who knocks him out and steals his guns so he can duplicate them back home. Grifter follows Neo to Taiwan and invades his warehouse to retrieve his property. Unfortunately, he gets caught in the crossfire when Diabolik shows up looking for a nuclear detonator that Neo has promised him.
